title: Drawing, "Design for Backcloth, for Checkmate", 1937–47
medium: Brush and gouache on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: Backcloth for 'Checkmate'
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Geometric design for backcloth in black, yellow, blue and red. Two hole punches on left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Backcloth, for Checkmate", 1937–47.
1937–47. Brush and gouache on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-273.
